title: Ultra Random Figures Question
body: So I just bought the Gentleman Gnar figure because of the free URF deal and I just wanted to know if there was a chance we could get figures we already own? I already have Poppy and Naut and if I got them again I would probably die.

replies.body: The URF Deal figures are in fact random, so there's definitely a chance you could end up getting Poppy or Nautilus again.
